name: G.I.R.A.F.
tagline: General Intelligent Replicant Assembled for Flooding - Perl5 IRC bot
body:
# Welcome to G.I.R.A.F. new homepage.
This page is presenting a short preview of the unlimiteds possibilities of G.I.R.A.F., or General Intelligent Replicant Assembled for Flooding, a Perl5 IRC Bot relying on POE::IRC and SQLite3.
G.I.R.A.F. is licensed under Creative Commons â€“ Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.0 Generic
Use at your own risks.

# Objectives
G.I.R.A.F. is aimed at everyone wanting a simple framework to develop his own IRC bot, supporting a wide range of modulares add-ons. This modularity is obtained by G.I.R.A.F. by encapsulating a whole lot a irc handling gruntwork and porivding a much simpler API.

# Authors
The main contributor is @gentilboulet, who developped the first version of this bot to spice up a summer internship in 2008.

Many thanks to a whole lot of other contributors :
* @sagara for his work on low level module handling in G.I.R.A.F.
* @Liche and @Anzufvytar for their support and for providing some modules

# Support
If you have any question, feel free to meet us on IRC : #giraf@irc.iiens.net .
